title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - May 21 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - May 21 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


Everyone now echoing Rush: Open up! Barr says what Rush said: Obama won't be prosecuted. Rush will update on his health when he feels like it. Ron DeSantis earns his degree from the Limbaugh Institute, blasts media for doom predictions that Florida would become New York for coronavirus, deaths, cases. Cuomo has been abject failure, disaster. New Doomsday forecast model from Wharton School is designed to stop opening up. ABC News admits: No increase in cases in states that have opened up. Atlanta mayor: Opening hasn't been as bad as I thought... yet. DeBlasio: Don't swim or we'll take you out of the water. Lori Loughlin and husband take plea deal, will go to jail. Murphy: New Jersey has to take baby steps to reopen. Nothing shut down during 1918 Spanish Flu pandemic, no quarantine for AIDS. Dems push for mail-in ballots, but will it backfire on them? Reaction to Trump on hydroxychloroquine. Dems lost both special elections last week, despite mail-in ballots.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


Overwhelming GOP turnout will beat Democrat cheating. GOP mailed in more ballots in California, special election. Democrats want more deaths, shut down economy to beat Trump. Trump presser on way to Marine One. Drive-By reaction to Trump taking hydroxychloroquine. Millennials flee big cities, go back to parents. Will blue-state shutdowns backfire into red wave? Sound bites from Trump's impromptu press conference. Where are the models of what will happen to the economy if we stayed locked down? Trump task force did phenomenal job ramping up on ventilators, PPE, took way too long to focus on opening up. If we can go to Costco, supermarkets, gas stations and marijuana stores, we can go vote.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


David Marcus op-ed in the New York Post advocates for opening city. If it's in the American media today, it's about getting rid of Donald Trump. We're here because of a faulty UK model and Washington establishment doctors who want to get rid of Trump. 2016 Biden call with Ukrainian president leaked. Susan Rice's backdated memo written on Inauguration Day 2016. Disaffected California Democrat calls in. ChiComs lock down again over second wave? Rush not paying attention to any polls. Caller has taken hydroxychloroquine for almost 5 years. Pelosi calls Trump "morbidly obese", what does that make Stacey Abrams?


 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
